long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
tidytube is an open source extension that allows you to customise Youtube's UI by removing the parts that you don't like. This extension will allow to remove elements on the search pages, home pages and even block Shorts. Spend more time seeing more of what you want to see and less of what you don't. Simplify your Youtube experience by removing excess clutter.

Available on Firefox and Edge browsers also - visit https://tidytube.app

See the full list of what this extension can remove here: https://github.com/kakajuro/tidytube/blob/main/README.md

Other links:

More information about how it works: https://tidytube.app/about
Privacy policy: https://tidytube.app/privacy-policy
Source code: https://github.com/kakajuro/tidytube
Changelog: https://github.com/kakajuro/tidytube/releases
